<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given an iterator (Iter) that points at an instruction with a &quot;Then&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicate, tries to create the largest block of continuous predicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions possible, and returns the VPT Block Mask of that block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will try to perform some minor optimization in order to maximize the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab6395548cae73865213e279ae461db54">MachineBasicBlock::instr&#95;iterator</a> EndIter,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The idea of the predicate is that None, Then and Else are for use when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handling assembly language: they correspond to the three possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suffixes &quot;&quot;, &quot;t&quot; and &quot;e&quot; on the mnemonic. So when instructions are read</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from assembly source or disassembled from object code, you expect to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// see a mixture whenever there&#39;s a long VPT block. But in code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generation, we hope we&#39;ll never generate an Else as input to this pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Pred != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armvcc/#ab502517eafbff78277085abe288528bba13dd849b2c9c1b8b71d8dbd5edcd65c1">ARMVCC::Else</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;VPT block pass does not expect Else preds&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Search back for a VCMP that can be folded to create a VPT, or else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create a VPST directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder">MachineInstrBuilder</a> MIBuilder;</span></CodeLine>
